New Records: Australia suffered their biggest loss by runs in the Cricket World Cup history
Key Match Events: Marcus Stoinis was given out LBW despite his hand being off the bat
Post-Match Reflections: Pat Cummins said 'probably not much needs to be said tonight', 'I think everyone's hurting'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Australia were outclassed by South Africa, losing by a record 134 runs
Australia's fielding was sloppy, dropping six catches
Others: Australia's record in the tournament is 0-2, they need to beat Sri Lanka on Monday to arrest their sliding ladder position
